Specimen Type: Tissue (fresh frozen or FFPE), amniotic fluid or chorionic villi, peripheral blood
Purpose: To detect chromosomal abnormalities in autopsy, products of conception, or stillbirth samples.
Container: EDTA tube for peripheral blood; fresh tissue container or FFPE block for tissue specimens
Equipment: Chromosomal microarray platform (e.g., Affymetrix or Agilent), nucleic acid extraction kits, spectrophotometer or Qubit, microarray hybridization reagents, microarray scanner
